items.sentence: I\'ll be waiting for you at 2:30 in front of the school.
I hope to see you again the next time you\'re in Boston.
I thought I\'d visit Tom in the hospital this afternoon.
When her husband died, she felt like committing suicide.
I want to be able to speak French like a native speaker.
I think that we\'re going to ask Tom to help us do that.
You can\'t let other people make your decisions for you.
Tom advised Mary not to leave her windows open at night.
Tom would tell me if there were a problem, wouldn\'t he?
I\'m surprised Tom and Mary are still seeing each other.
